  • Back to HQ

  • I'm Luuk — 25, Dutch, ex-welder turned digital builder.

    How my life as a builder started:

    At 15, I was grinding steel. By 23, I quit welding to earn with just my brain, laptop, and time.

    Being lost for a while:

    I was drifting. No plan. Then I found programming — and realized I could build the future from a keyboard. With reach through the World Wide Web.
    I spiraled through loops: Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Rust, Web2, Web3.

    Until I made a decision:

    • Rust — because it forces you to learn how systems really work. It teaches you to think. With Rust, you can build everything from websites to secure blockchain infrastructure.
    • Web3 — because I believe in its philosophy: owning your keys, your data, and your future.

    My mission:

    Become a sovereign man — free in thought, fit in body, and wealthy in time. Giving back through building products, sharing progress, and connecting with like minded individuals.

    How to stay up to date:

    Follow me here: LinkedIn, X/Twitter. You'll get an update every time a new post goes live.
